title: Book tests for multiple vehicles online

details.description: Book, reschedule or cancel multiple annual tests, paid retests, prohibition clearances, Reduced Pollution Certificate (RPC) and Low Emissions Certificate (LEC) tests, and voluntary tests
details.more_information:
The multiple test booking service is available to registered users only.

To register you’ll need your membership and confirmation numbers from VOSA.

If you can’t find these, contact:

VOSA Helpline
webbookings@vosa.gov.uk
0300 123 9000

If you haven’t registered for this service, then you can book an annual test for a single vehicle without needing to register.

What you can’t book

You can’t use this service to book:

  • part paid retests
  • technical tests (eg first-time trailer test)
  • vehicle identity check
  • Individual Vehicle Approval or motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval tests

Cancelling, rescheduling and viewing bookings

You’ll need the order reference number you were given when the original booking was made, eg 1-212101212.

You can also use this service to manage your VOSA pre-funded account, and update your contact details.

You can’t cancel or reschedule within 3 working days of a test or you’ll lose your fee. Working days are Monday to Friday except bank holidays.
details.introduction:
If you’re already registered with VOSA, you can book, reschedule or cancel the following tests for multiple vehicles:

  • annual tests

  • paid retests

  • prohibition clearances

  • Reduced Pollution Certificate (RPC) and Low Emissions Certificate (LEC) tests

  • voluntary tests

tags.title: Drivers of lorries, buses and goods vehicles

details.description: Includes tests, health and safety, roadside checks and carrying loads

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

related.title: Book a single annual test online
